name: Speed of Light by Jack Frost Episode 2
metadata:
{"name": "Speed of Light by Jack Frost (Episode 2) 1/500", "description": "Congratulations on successfully acquiring The Legend of Jack Frost: Episode 2 "Speed of Light"! Thank you for collecting this Jack Frost digital collectible!

The Legend of Jack Frost: Episode 2 "Speed of Light", marks two very important milestones in our herob�s journey.  The first milestone is that Jack is now on Earth for the first time in this storyline. The second milestone is that for the very first time, you can actually help Jack on his mission to Save The Universe. 

Episode 2 finds our hero racing through space at the speed of light.  His ship is in Earthb�s solar system, and just outside of Earthb�s orbitb�&it seems our hero is getting closer to Earth as we speak! But skeptics at home worry, is he getting too close?

In this episode, Jack Frost Alien DJ finds himself on a routine space mission outside the planet Earthb�s orbit. Suddenly and unexpectedly, his ship is struck by an asteroid and he is forced to crash land his ship on the nearest neighboring planet, Earth. When Jackb�s ship crashed on Earth, he was immediately taken into custody by the US Government. He is currently being held captive at the top secret remote facility on Edwards Air Force Base in Nevada known as Area 51. 

Jack needs your help to Escape from Area 51. As Jackb�s ship was struck by the asteroid and he begin falling towards Earth, much of his equipment and resources were scattered all across the globe. Your mission is to collect these resources and build your inventory so that you can help Jack Escape from Area 51.

Step 1: Collect both Episode 1 & 2 of The Legend of Jack Frost

Step 2: Celebrate the drop on Twitter! Visit Twitter and share a cool post about the drop, and be sure to include the hashtag #EscapeFromArea51

Step 3: Visit jackfrost.xyz on Sunday August 21 at 5pm EST/2pm PST to claim your first resource (must have both Episode 1 & 2 in your wallet at the time of claim)

Step 4: Await further instructions

The Universe Needs You. Join Us.", "image": "ipfs://bafkreifsutjcvylholcxrig2usok2js6wmmwxm7nwkdrwpkn5sjhntijta?id=1", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeigj2aifgd5wa6i5fp2uxlbufzxib7qcmfty6hbfy3fmupxsd7wavy?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Speed of Light by Jack Frost (Episode 2)"}}
